marklogic.body: I think Felix Doubront or Aceves should be the 5th man in the rotation. You cannot trust Bard, he is way too wild, he reminds me of that reliever Craig Hansen with the fast fastball and crazy slider, he could never Spot his pitches. I think Bard should start in relief and if he is crappy, send him down to AAA or trade him. Everyone apparently thinks he is amazingly good, so we could get some actual good players for him if we trade him.
